data.name: The Past Rhapsody
data.detailed_description: Embark on this new adventure, uncovering a brave hero's quest as he encounters a variety of daunting locations in an attempt to return to the real world after entering the afterlife. Join Pavel and Hori on a strange voyage filled with darkness and truths that change their friendship forever. Bringing you a unique short story in the form of an RPG that captures the essence of the classic RPG era with 2D graphics, turn-based challenging combat, and a collection of mesmerizing original music, making your time with this mystical journey of Pavel and Hori worthwhile.

data.short_description: A short, about an hour long Eastern old-schhool RPG about forbidden lands and broken friendships. Somewhat amusing, somewhat dark, It's about a hero's journey to understand himself and his life long frienemy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10.
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or better.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
